instruction: Given an English language product review, determine if it is a Good Review or a Bad Review. A good review is one where the product's review has positive tone and Bad review is one where the tone of product's review is negative.
input: I have owned a Krups espresso machine in the past that worked great, but this one, although it looks great and works wonderfully, makes terrible coffee. instruction: Given an English language product review, determine if it is a Good Review or a Bad Review. A good review is one where the product's review has positive tone and Bad review is one where the tone of product's review is negative.
input: I used these spoons for my kids lunches and one spoon shattered on the first use. You can only get four uses out of them before they are unusable. Poor quality. Not worth wasting money. In case I'm being cheap enough or too lazy I'll reuse them! :) Don't waste your money like me.
